Comment.value:
26th January, 2006

The GodLoc Marker is used if the God System is in use.
If the player has a valid deity and are saved at the time of death they will appear at the GodLoc marker.
It's recommended you place this in your temple.

The default chance that a player will be raised by their god if they have one by  is 5% +1% per 4 levels of the character.
